comment: Needs to be repaired. I have followed several pages, but when I go to see my followed pages, they aren't there. Then when I search the page, it has the button for me to follow. I don't understand the issue.
key sentence: Search for a page that was followed, and find that the option to follow the page is available again, indicating it was not successfully followed.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
